text: Melissa Manchester (born February 15, 1951 in the Bronx, New York) is an American singer, songwriter and actress. She has acted in several movies. She has received several awards during her musical career, which began in the late 1960s. ==Other websites== * Category:American pop musicians Category:Singers from New York City Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Melissa Manchester
